trans-unit.source: Creates a container within which other controls can share horizontal or vertical space.
trans-unit.target: Cria um contêiner no qual outros controles podem compartilhar um espaço horizontal ou vertical.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> to hold one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> or user-defined controls.
trans-unit.target: Use um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> para manter um ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> ou controles definidos pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: You might find that one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> controls meet the needs of your application better than a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> if you do not need the four panels and the central <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode achar que um ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> controles atender às necessidades do seu aplicativo melhor do que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> se você não precisar de quatro painéis e central <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.

trans-unit.source: You can use only one panel if you so choose, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> works well in Multiple Document Interface (MDI) scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar somente um painel, se preferir, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> funciona bem em cenários de Interface de documentos múltiplos (MDI).

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> is expandable and collapsible.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> é expansíveis e recolhíveis.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> controls with a multiple document interface (MDI).
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> controles com uma interface de documentos múltiplos (MDI).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se habilitado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se habilitado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se habilitado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se habilitado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> automatically adjusts its size when the form is resized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> ajusta automaticamente seu tamanho quando o formulário é redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> automatically resizes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> é redimensionado automaticamente; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.AutoSize" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.AutoSize" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.AutoSizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.AutoSizeChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> named `ToolStripPanel1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> chamado `ToolStripPanel1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.AutoSizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.AutoSizeChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Começa a inicialização de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Recupera uma coleção de controles <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de controles <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the space, in pixels, that is specified by default between controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaço, em pixels, que é especificado pelo padrão entre os controles.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> that represents the default space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> que representa o espaço padrão entre controles.

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaçamento interno, em pixels, do conteúdo de um controle.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> that represents the internal spacing of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> que representa o espaçamento interno do conteúdo de um controle.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público `Dispose` e pelo método <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` invoca o método `Dispose(Boolean)` protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> cuidado para não fazer referência a objetos que têm foi descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which control borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a control is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define quais bordas de controle são encaixadas no controle pai e determina como um controle é redimensionado com seu pai.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is None.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é None.

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Termina a inicialização de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> para adicionar ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> especificado a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.Join%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.Join%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> para adicionar ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> value representing the x- and y-client coordinates, in pixels, of the new location for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que representa as coordenadas de cliente x- e y-, em pixels, do novo local do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> especificado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> no local especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> para adicionar ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> to which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is added.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> que representa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> ao qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> é adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> in the specified row.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> especificado a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> na linha especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="row" /> parameter is less than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="row" /> é menor que zero (0).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> para adicionar ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal client coordinate, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada de cliente horizontal, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The vertical client coordinate, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada de cliente vertical, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> especificado a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> nas coordenadas especificadas.

trans-unit.source: Gets a cached instance of the control's layout engine.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância armazenada em cache do mecanismo de layout do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> for the control's contents.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> para o conteúdo do controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> can be moved or resized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> pode ser movido ou redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> can be moved or resized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> pode ser movido ou redimensionado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ControlAdded" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ControlAdded" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlAdded%2A> method is called when a child control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlAdded%2A> método é chamado quando um controle filho é adicionado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlAdded%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlAdded%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ControlRemoved" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ControlRemoved" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlRemoved%2A> is called when a child control is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlRemoved%2A> é chamado quando um controle filho é removido o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlRemoved%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlRemoved%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DockChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DockChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnDockChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnDockChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnDockChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnDockChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnDockChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnDockChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnLayout%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnLayout%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: Colore a tela de fundo do controle.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnParentChanged(System.EventArgs)" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the horizontal or vertical orientation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica a orientação horizontal ou vertical do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> used as a reference to find the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> usado como referência para localizar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> given a point within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> client area.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> de acordo com um ponto dentro da área de cliente <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> that contains the <paramref name="raftingContainerPoint" />, or <see langword="null" /> if no such <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> exists.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> que contém o <paramref name="raftingContainerPoint" /> ou <see langword="null" />, se tal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> não existir.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> used to customize the appearance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> usado para personalizar a aparência de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> that handles painting.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> que manipula a pintura.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.Renderer" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.Renderer" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.RendererChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.RendererChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> named `ToolStripPanel1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> chamado `ToolStripPanel1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.RendererChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.RendererChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the painting styles to be applied to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os estilos de pintura a serem aplicados ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the spacing, in pixels, between the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />s and the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o espaçamento, em pixels, entre o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />s e o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> value representing the spacing, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> valor que representa o espaçamento, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />s in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />s nesse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.ToolStripPanelRowCollection" /> representing the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />s in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.ToolStripPanelRowCollection" /> que representa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />s neste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
